alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued September 26 at 7:35PM MST until September 26 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 815 PM MST. * At 735 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Chui-Chu to near Casa Grande to Coolidge Airport, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than three miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 174 and 199. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 151 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 125 and 155. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Maricopa, La Palma, Blackwater, Magma, San Tan Valley, Coolidge Airport, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Arizola, San Tan Mountain Park and Randolph. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
